              gdpcore.NimblePositionExtractor

public class NimblePositionExtractor
extends gdpcore.GenomicPositionIntensityFileExtractor

The NimblePositionExtractor class provides tool to extract data from a nimbleGene file.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie
